messages.title: YOUR EAST BARNET WARD CONSERVATIVE TEAM
messages.content: The leaflet introduces the Conservative team called to serve the local community, showing the engagement of the team with the locals through pictures.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting to keep Council Tax rises down year after year, despite one of the lowest government grants in London.
Improving our parks and green open spaces – most of the premier parks now have a Green Flag Award.
Working to drive up standards in schools. Barnet’s primary schools are now in the top 10% in the country.
Fighting Labour's cuts to local NHS services.
Working to support local jobs and businesses.

mentions.candidate: In December, Barry was selected to fight the East Barnet area a prospective candidate and the next council elections in May 2010.

issues.education: Working to drive up standards in schools. Barnet’s primary schools are now in the top 10% in the country.
issues.environment: Improving our parks and green open spaces – most of the premier parks now have a Green Flag Award.
issues.health: Fighting Labour's cuts to local NHS services.

images.caption: A photo showing Cllr Robert Rams and MP for Chipping Barnet, Theresa Villiers, presenting a government petition against over-development of the Save New Barnet campaign.
Cllr Robert Rams, Cllr Joanna Tambourides and Cllr Lynne Hillan (Leader of Barnet Council) celebrating at East Barnet School's topping out ceremony.
